content:
Hi there,
I download latest version from master branch today and run publish.sh and get the following error information:
BUILD FAILED
/build/build.xml:30: The following error occurred while executing this line:
/build/tools/java/org.hl7.fhir.tools.core/build.xml:145: Java returned: 1

and 145 line is : maxmemory="9000m"
@Lloyd McKenzie
Is there anything on your console before "BUILD FAILED"?
Here is the log file.log.txt

Impressive :) Haven't seen a failure like that before. Are you running the build "out of the box" or do you have local customizations? @Grahame Grieve , any thoughts as to the possible cause here? It's deep in the SHEX stuff
I run sh publish.sh at the root directory and don't do any change. It runs on maxOS Sierra 10.12.3, java version 1.8.0
deep down the in the scala stuff? yuck
